name: Amazon Product Price Data
description: Cheap and lightweight API to get rich Amazon product metadata

api_methods.name: product
api_methods.description:
Get Amazon product price information by locale.

ASINs provided will be searched by the locale provided, e.g. if `B005YQZ1KE,B074R8RQQ2` were provided and `US` as a locale were provided, it will provide metadata from only `amazon.com`.

Please note that price data may be up to 30 minutes out of date.

Currently supported locales:

US (amazon.com)
UK (amazon.co.uk)
CA (amazon.ca)
IN (amazon.in)
FR (amazon.fr)

More coming soon!

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description:
Currently supported locales:

US (amazon.com)
UK (amazon.co.uk)
CA (amazon.ca)
IN (amazon.in)
FR (amazon.fr)

More coming soon!

utterances.utterance: Can you get the price details for ASINs B005YQZ1KE and B074R8RQQ2 on Amazon US?
I need the price information for the ASINs B01N5IB20Q and B01N1SE4EP on Amazon UK.
What's the current price for ASINs B00X4WHP5E and B00X4WHP5F on Amazon Canada?
Fetch the price data for ASINs B07PGL2ZSL and B07PGL2ZSM from Amazon India.
Could you provide the price details for ASINs B07D9C7SQV and B07D9C7SQW on Amazon France?
Get me the price information for ASINs B00ZV9PXP2 and B00ZV9PXP3 on Amazon US.
I want to know the prices for ASINs B01M8L5Z3Y and B01M8L5Z3Z on Amazon UK.
Please find the price for ASINs B00X4WHP5G and B00X4WHP5H on Amazon Canada.
Can you check the price for ASINs B07PGL2ZSN and B07PGL2ZSO on Amazon India?
I'd like the price details for ASINs B07D9C7SQX and B07D9C7SQY on Amazon France.
